title: Momentum - graphs of mass and position

content.question: A truck is driving slowly in a straight line along a road through a forest. As the truck moves, large pieces of wood are tossed into the back, increasing its mass. The total mass of the truck and wood as well as the truck’s position are recorded every <math alttext="10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn></math> seconds and represented in the graphs. The magnitude of the momentum of the truck-wood system at time <math alttext="40" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>40</mn></mstyle></math> seconds is most nearly

choices.label: <math alttext="4.0 times 10 squared newton seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math>

<math alttext="4.0 times 10 cubed newton seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math>

<math alttext="5.5 times 10 cubed newton seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math>

<math alttext="2.2 times 10 to the fifth power newtons seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="4.0 times 10 cubed newton seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
